Text: Account ActivatedThank you for replying to the verification Congratulations your ListBot account has been activated You have been added to This is a discussion list In order to send mail to the list you need to address your message to When replying to list messages use the reply to all feature of your email program to send the response back to the list ListBot puts YOU in control letting you manage all of your list subscriptions from a single web site If you ever want to unsubscribe from any ListBot mailing list please visit cgibinsubscriber and use the login info you provided at signup Email ListBot Password rawrho Thanks Sincerely The ListBot Team
